. Steve Ballmer formally introduced Windows 7 last month at an industry event in New York City. Steve Ballmer said Windows 7 is simple to use, responsive, and unobtrusively secure-all things Vista was not. The OS makes everyday use of a PC better, said Steve Ballmer .
